Package curam.util.persistence.validation.basic.validator

Provides a set of common basic validator implementations, independent of the Customizable Validation infrastructure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasicCollectionValidator
    Basic Validator methods for Java Collection objects.
    BasicDateTimeValidator
    Basic Validator methods for DateTime objects.
    BasicDateValidator
    Basic Validator methods for Date objects.
    BasicMoneyValidator
    Basic Validator methods for Money types.
    BasicNumberValidator
    Basic Validator methods for numeric primitive types.
    BasicObjectValidator
    Basic core validation methods for all Object types.
    BasicStringValidator
    Basic Validation methods for String objects.

Package curam.util.persistence.validation.basic.validator Description

Provides a set of common basic validator implementations, independent of the Customizable Validation infrastructure. Note that the curam.util.persistence.validation.customizable package contains the interfaces for the recommended means of using the validators.

However, the validators are also provided independently in this package so that they can be used standalone by implementations not requiring the rest of the Customizable Validation infrastructure.
